# /api/vehicle/info/dimensions

- Method: function call
- Type: [autoware_adapi_v1_msgs/srv/GetVehicleDimensions](../../../../types/autoware_adapi_v1_msgs/srv/get_vehicle_dimensions.md)

## Description
